Episode.GuestStars: |Jack Shearer|Gary Riotto|Monique Edwards|Saba Homayoon|Sarah Loew|Marshall Manesh|Tony Rossi|
Episode.Overview: When Ted's best friend Marshall proposes to his girlfriend, Lily, Ted realizes he'd better get a move on if he hopes to find true love. Ted soon meets Robin in a neighborhood bar, immediately becomes smitten and scores a first date. But when Ted can hardly wait to see her again, his eagerness threatens to scare her away.
